import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; class Register extends Component{ state = { username: "", usernameError: "", matric: "", matricError: "", password: "", passwordError: "", role: "", roleError: "" }; handleChange = event => { const isCheckbox = event.target.type === "checkbox"; this.setState({ [event.target.name] : isCheckbox ? event.target.checked : event.target.value }); }; handleSubmit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); } render(){ return( Nimelssa quiz - Registeration page
Craete Account
account_box this.handleChange(event)} />
edit {this.handleChange(event)}} />
lock {this.handleChange(event)}} />
account_circle {this.handleChange(event)}} />


) } } export default Register;
